greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle with columns built from certain power sequences.
comment: The column sequences (without leading 0's)give: A000012, A002001, A067403-A067409 for m=0..8. The tenth column (m=9) gives [1, 19, 1900, 190000,...].
xref: Cf. A009998 (triangle built from powers of (m+1)).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jan 25 2002
ext: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jun 11 2002
